changeSet.author: rgalante
changeSet.comment: migrating existing AMW_FUNCTIONS permissions to restrictions
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+800) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'ALL', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'MANAGE_AMW_FUNCTIONS' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+800) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'ALL', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'MANAGE_AMW_APP_INSTANCE_FUNCTIONS' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

INSERT INTO TAMW_restriction (id, role_id, permission_id, action, v) SELECT (TAMW_permission.id-TAMW_role.id+800) AS id, TAMW_role.id AS role_id, TAMW_permission.id AS permission_id, 'READ', 0 FROM TAMW_role JOIN TAMW_role_permission ON TAMW_role.id = TAMW_role_permission.roles_id JOIN TAMW_permission ON TAMW_role_permission.permissions_id = TAMW_permission.id WHERE TAMW_permission.value = 'VIEW_AMW_FUNCTIONS' AND TAMW_role_permission.roles_id = TAMW_role.id;

update.where: permission_id = (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'MANAGE_AMW_APP_INSTANCE_FUNCTIONS')
permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'MANAGE_AMW_APP_INSTANCE_FUNCTIONS' or value = 'VIEW_AMW_FUNCTIONS')

delete.where: permissions_id IN (SELECT id FROM TAMW_permission WHERE value = 'AMWFUNCTION' or value = 'MANAGE_AMW_APP_INSTANCE_FUNCTIONS' or value = 'VIEW_AMW_FUNCTIONS')
